Title: Afghan Hound
Actors: Lavrenti Lopes, Adam Griffith, Paul Anderson, Matt McGorry
Plot: A soldier, paralyzed with PTSD, encounters the now-grown child of parents he killed. (Or perhaps not.) What follows? Martyrdom. Torture. Torment. Revenge. Castigation. Catharsis. Guilt. Atonement. And maybe, ultimately, redemption.
